content: in any form or by any means without written permission pattern notes lace stripe round 9 k1 yo k to m yo repeat between brackets 3 more times this square is knit from the center out in the round you ll increase 8 sts every other round on either side of 4 corner lace stripe round 10 knit stitches markers are placed at each corner stitch to mark lace stripe round 11 k1 yo k to m yo repeat between them once markers are placed slip them every round brackets 3 more times lace stripe round 12 knit set-up for square lace stripe round 13 k1 yo k7 *ssk 3 times yo k1 cast on 8 sts using an invisible circular cast-on with the 6 times k2tog 3 times repeat from * to last 8 sts k8 yo end of your yarn form a loop leaving a 12 tail place your repeat between brackets 3 more times working yarn over your tail facing to the left the tail yarn is underneath and going to the right 1 put your needle into the lace stripe round 14 knit 72 sts between markers 288 total loop from the front to back and grab the working yarn to pull sts on needle through 1 st created 2 swing your needle over the top of the loop and yarnover with the working yarn 1 st created repeat work stockinette rounds 1-2 eleven more times 94 sts steps 1 and 2 until you have 8 sts on your needle slide your between markers 376 total sts on needle sts onto multiple double points or divide for magic loop ready to work in the round you can tighten up the cast-on loop by pulling on the tail now and you will be able to tighten it closed work lace stripe rounds 1-14 completely when you weave in ends if you prefer use emily ocker s circular cast-on or another invisible circular cast-on of your choice work stockinette rounds 1-2 ten more times 128 sts between markers 512 total sts on needle set-up round 1 knit note if you choose to work your border in a second color set-up round 2 k1 yo k1 yo pm k1 yo k1 yo pm change color on the following round k1 yo k1 yo pm k1 yo k1 yo pm bor 16 sts work stockinette round 1 once 130 sts between markers set-up round 3 knit 520 total sts on needle purl 1 round square body stockinette round 1 k1 yo k to m yo repeat between border brackets 3 more times lace border rounds 1-14 repeat lace stripe rounds 1-14 stockinette round 2 knit lace border round 15 k1 yo k to m yo repeat between repeat stockinette rounds 1-2 twenty-five more times 58 sts brackets 3 more times between markers 232 total sts on needle lace border round 16 knit lace border round 17 k1 yo k to m yo repeat between lace stripe round 1 k1 yo
